BlackStorm:

BlackStorm woke up and felt scared about what happened she ran 
towards the exit and tried to pull Hevn inside "I'll, personally, 
care that this no happen again, Hevn "
said the femme
--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Hevn::
>        He delayed slightly before leaving Maxima to return to the 
base.  He 
> gets most of the way to the base before he realizes he was never 
given 
> clearance.  This fact is made quite clear when the first 
autocannon clips his wing and 
> sends him spiraling down into the woods.  He groans and scrambles 
out of 
> range, opening a comlink to Blackstorm while en route.  "Hi, 
Blackstorm, Hevn 
> here.  Could you do me a big favor and let me inside?  You see 
they never got 
> around to programming the defenses to recognize me."
